content.detailedDescription: November 1st is opening day for deer season in my county in texas. i live in rio grande city buy i hunt on a family ranch about 30 miles north near a small town called san isidro. my friends and i been planning to spend the night there since we have a ranch house on the property. this year was unusual in that opening day of deer season fell the day after halloween so that night we were pretty much occupied going to get togethers and what not.At  we ended up leaving the city at around 1 in the morning and arrived at the ranch house at around 1:30 a.M. i was with 5 other indvidual riding in the same vehicle which is my 2000 ford excursion. we arrived at camp decided that it was better to stay awake than to risk not waking up in the morning. all of us stayed up and made a fire under a tin porch and we barbecued fajtas,sirloin, and burgers. we stayed up cooking and playing poker until we decided it was time to start going so we loaded up on the truck and left the house at approximately 530. once arriving at the first gate which is hitched with a chain my freind go down to open the gate and i drove through and stopped to wait for him go get back on. it was during this pause that i observed a large ball of color changing light which appeared to be static in the sky and appeared to be to the right of the ranch house and facing more or lees south east of our position. i observed the light morphing into different colors without any pause between transitions the lights were literally morphing into different colors and hues or green blue, red, violets within fractions of a second it seemed almost like  a kaleidoscope sparkling in the sky. i got down from my truck and grabbed a pair of bushnell 10x32 binoculars and observed the light continuing to morph with light seeming to glow left to right and many horizontal angles. i did not believe what i was seeing so i asked my other friends to see if they were seeing the same thing they all said they were witnessing the lights change color and we identified the colors we were seeing aloud simultaneously. after about 5 minutes i witnessed the light seem to move positions and move towards the left hovering just right of the ranch house the light seemed to be about the size of large red antenna bulb but there are no antennas in that direction and the light seemed to be only 2-4 miles from wher we were aty hovering at the end of a filed and past a path of the woods. i considered the what the light could be but it was too close. large and colorful to be a satellite or planet or even star. considerations towards oter aircraft maybe be considered but the lights i saw continuously changed and morphed lights  and seeme to hover for extended periods of time and slowlya nd progressively hove. the lights were so bright i could not distinguish solid distinct shape but it seemed round and some what cross shaped in nature. after viewing this 20 minutes we decied we had enought and that it was getting late to go into the deer stand so we took off and i observed it from afar through the mirror as we road down the road.
content.summary: Multi color morphing ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was loading my delivery truck,there were 4 other witnesses with me it was a long time ago but i want your help and input to help me refine my dates and time.It was early morning i just saw a disk not moving in the sky i was on 4th street & bainbridge in south philly the disk was to the north east it seemed to be above the delaware river from where i was.I asked my fellow employees if the were seeing it also after i got a much relived yes to my question from the south i heard the sound of a jet but could not see it the buildings blocked my view,then i could see a jet from the south go straight for the disk at high speed, the disk just went straight up and the jet went right through the spot where the disk was the jet veered to the left and the disk slowley descended back to its original spot the jet made a wide circle around center city philly and made a second run at the disk again, the disk just went straghit up and the jet went around the city  again the disk just came back down slowly to its original spot ,then my co worker- who was in some service of the military said that it was a nasa jet because it had blue tipped wings i saw the blue tips but i dont know that stuff. the jet reapeared for the third pass at the disk this time the disk went up and slightly away to the east and was gone. but here is were it gets interesting my heart and my mind was going nuts i made my deliverys the i stoped at a friend house for lunch and on the tv on the news the were saying and i quote the news " dont be alarmed if you see nasa jets flying around the are only conducting tests " and they showed a still photo of a blue tipped jet on the 12:00 news i know its been years but we can find this peace of news footige i am sorry i did not date it but it was the mid 90s i can look at my old work record what year i worked at that company also to narrow it down
content.summary: I saw a disk flying above the city in the daytime

content.detailedDescription:
As my grandmother and i were driving through traffic, i was noting how many airplanes were traversing the sky at that time (i counted 6 airplanes complete with trails at the time).  scanning the horizon while stopped at a traffic light, i noted 2 more airplanes with trails in the distance.  i then glanced up high in the sky out the driver's side window and happened to see a shining light, very small but up much higher than the airplanes.  it was zipping along at a much faster rate than the airplanes were flying.  it had no trail.  i shouted to my grand mother "do you see that!  look!  look!"  unfortunately my grandmother wasn't able to see the light from the passednger seat as it was above her line of vision due to the roof of the van.  not only that, but she is legally blind in one eye and has somewhat limited vision in the other.  i realized that the light was so small she probably would not be able to see it anyway.  i did not bother to try to photograph the light as it was very small and i doubted that its image would have been recorded on my camera (which i now carry with me, just in case - but not enough zoom power to capture the light, i guessed).  moreover, it was moving at such a high rate of speed that i also doubted that i would be fast enough to capture it in a photograph if i pulled over, as it was moving in the opposite direction.  the light turned green and i had to move on, and thus quickly lost sight of it.  when we arrived at our destination, i scanned the sky for the light but as i expected, it was no longer visible.

just to be sure in my own mind, i have a few questions.  are satellites ever visible as small reflective-type lights during the day?  do satellites appear to move faster than planes?  this thing was so high up i suppose it could have been a satellite, as it was moving at a uniform rate and was moving in a straight line.  the light did not appear to be a meteor as it was not descending, nor did it have a tail, nor was the color of the light red (it was plain white, like a reflection or just a white light) but do meteors ever appear as white lights in the sky?
content.summary: High altitude round white light/object with no contrail moving 3 times faster than airplanes with contrails in the area.

content.detailedDescription:
Today, 05-nov-2008 at 11:22 am est, while shooting pictures for a school project at the beach off of seabreeze blvd. in fort lauderdale, florida, usa, i noticed north of where i was standing at lat 26���6'44"n and lon 80���6'15"w, at between 10��� to 20��� altitude, a round, brilliant, gold and white ball moving on an apparently south-east direction and holding its altitude.  

i trained my camera at the moving element and zoomed in as much as i could with the normal lens i had on the camera at the time, following the element's south-east path.  in total, i took twenty-two (22) pictures of the ufo's sighting, sequentially numbered from _mg_1669.Jpg (@11:22:04 am) through _mg_1690.Jpg (@ 11:23:09 am).  

this was no weather balloon, especially as evidenced in files _mg_1686.Jpg (@11:23:00 am) and _mg_1687.Jpg (@ 11:23:03 am).  _mg_1686.Jpg shows the element still flying at a steady speed, after which it disappeared totally; it went 100% invisible, right before my camera eye, as shown on file _mg_1687.Jpg.  

today's flying ball looked in some aspects very much like one i photographed from the same location on 15-sep-2008 and later on reported to several ufo-information-gathering web sites, including mufon.  during that first sighting on 15-sep-2008 i was shooting with a different camera that allowed a better close up of the brilliant flying ball, while capturing two more orange-with-transparency flying balls.  

soon after today's sighting, more precisely at 12:06 pm, i contacted h���ctor trujillo, mufon's field investigator in the area, from my cell phone and told him what happened.  i told h���ctor i would copy for him all the picture files, untouched, straight from my camera's memory card onto a cd, which i already did.  

i am uploading with this report to this website three of the 22 pictures mentioned above.  the first one (# _mg_1669.Jpg) shows the general location of today's flying ball with relationship to the beach, sky and buildings in the area.  the second (# _mg_1675.Jpg) and third (# _mg_1683.Jpg) pictures are blowups or magnifications of the better of the remaining files, showing the flying ball.  bear in mind i didn't have a telephoto lens on my camera; i was shooting with a wide-to-normal lens (18mm - 55mm).  

i am mufon's journal subscriber no. 13121.
content.summary: Ufo seen and photographed in fort lauderdale

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to spoon river college for an evening class. i immediately spotted a bright orange "ball" of light to the left of my car and ahead of me.  the half-moon and venus were very visable.  this object was brighter than anything else in the sky.  it was directly on a east to west direction and was very fast moving.  i tried to catch up to it and could not.  it had a weird very bright orangish glow, had no flashing lights, no associated sound. i got to the school parking lot and asked a girl from class to look at the object. she just shrugged and said it didn't look like any conventional aircraft she had seen and said, "huh...Maybe it's a ufo." we watched it for about a minute before having to leave to get to class.  it changed or maybe faded is a better term from bright orange to a very bright amber.  i was slightly shaking and it definitely distracted me from my psych test.  i looked and did not see the object about an hour latter leaving the school.
content.summary: I was west on hickory street, when i saw a bright orange ball of light.  i speed to try and catch it and could not.  it was flashing light orange to a bright amber color.

content.detailedDescription:
On november 1st,2008; in my backyard in miami,fl; at approximately 2pm, possibly a little later; my fiance, lauren sylvester, and i were enjoying the good weather and playing with our dogs.
  as we were resting on the ground i noticed a distinct five point american flag type star beyond the furthest clouds i could see.  it appeared to be, at arm's distance, approximately the size of the top half of my thumb. as the lower level clouds passed, it appeared to be separate from all other clouds, but yet seeming to be made of clouds.  however it's shape appeared  geometrically perfect and distinct. the interrior seemed solid much like the moon appears in the daytime sky. the shape was perfect like the plastic "glow in the dark" stars you can buy for children's bedroom ceilings.
 my first thought was that it could be a holographic image like the ones at disney world's haunted house. my next thought was, 'how could that be? since it's daytime and so far away?'  my next reaction was (silently)...What the hell is that? i immediately turned to lauren who was right next to me reclining, and asked her "do you see that?". she said..."yes!!"  my next question was..."what do you see?"  she said, "a star!! a perfectly shaped star!!"  her impression was that it was a way too perfectly star-shaped cloud.  there was several exclamations of "oh my god!!!" then it's edges seemed to begin to disintegrate starting with it's upper, right side. and moving to the other edges of this image and then disappating altogether. it was not moving in conjunction with any of the other cloud formations.
 i have hesitated to tell anyone about this, and lauren has only told her 15 year old daughter.  the reason for my hesitation is to avoid ridicule. also, it was directly above us, and i would like to know if anyone in the area of southeast florida had noticed anything like this on that day.
content.summary: Playing with dogs in backyard, paused to relax on ground, staring up, noticed perfectly formed five point star in clouds. verified visual with fiance, lauren sylvester.

content.detailedDescription: Years ago, i'm 49 and was 17 or 18 at that time, my date and i were going to a party.  it was on a back road in arkansas.  between conway and my small town was a nuclear missile base though i don't know if that has anything to do with this, but as a side note.  we were on this back road, less than 10 miles from this base, but it was desserted.  in the distance we both saw two red lights, spaced apart slightly more than car headlights and above the ground ten feet, maybe a few more.  in a second or two, it flew over the top of our car, following the path of this crooked road an a rapid speed.  i would estimate a hundred miles per hour or more.  i was numb and sat there and my date kept driving.  after a minute or two, i looked over at him and asked, "what was that?"  he was graduating college soon and had his career to think about so he said, "i don't know, but i'm not telling anyone."  i nodded.  i still remember it clearly as to this day, i don't know of anything that can go this fast at this height.  since it was dark and flew over us so quickly, i didn't get the shape.  there were no street lights on this seldom used road.
content.summary: My date and i were driving on a little used road when a craft flew over the car.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out window because of fireworks after election news, the whire 
glowing disc moved slowly to the west behind the trees. it lasted about 2min.I wasn't surprised this is where they all come too.I was excited
about the election. after the event i finally slept. it suddenly appeared
when i first noticed it.
content.summary: The fireworks were going off and a white disc appeared moving slowley to west

content.detailedDescription: Found this while looking through photos taken on trip out west in july. driving through rockies on our way to banff. never noticed it at time. object is above mountain peak and to the right. photo is in original format so you can enlarge. maybe you can identify it?
content.summary: Ufo photo

content.detailedDescription: It was october of 1996. i was in the sixth grade and had been voted king of my class for harvest festival. me and a guy who really is the meaning of hillbilly. {terrible witness!!}. were outside of my house as it had just turned dark. we had went to my mothers mustang to eat some cupcakes i could'nt sell at school.{trying to raise money for my school.} when i noticed a red ball of light in the distance, i immediately thought it was a cellular tower, because they had just started setting those up out here. but my thoughts quickly changed when the light started to come in our direction. i told my ex-friend. "hey man look at this [pd/tg]." he got out of the car and then we both witnessed a small red ball of light that was not pulsing or anything just glowing. it was less than a football field away from us and very low to the ground. {just above the powerlines.} it come toward us and then stopped and sat there for about 30 seconds. then it took a left and slowly disappeared behind the trees. and i am very serious when i say i felt like i was being watched!! i was pretty sick to my stomach. we went inside my house quickly, and told my mother, and i've loved aliens and u.F.O.'s ever since.
content.summary: It was exactly like bentwaters england. a close up with a slow u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription:
Heading home from work on wednesday evening, october 29 around 6:30pm. this was before daylight savings time kicked in, so there was still the dusky watercolor of twilight in the sky. i check out what's in the heavens as i drive to and from work; catch a meteor or watch aircraft every now and then. my drive time is approximately 1 hour and 10 minutes each way - st. cloud, mn to the twin cities and vice versa.  i had just passed the silver lake road exit on hwy 694 and was heading west (and north) towards st. cloud. there's a lot of air traffic through the 694 corridor, as i am not far from the international airport, and something odd caught my eye as it was flying parallel to my car and i could see it from underneath. i can't say at what altitude it was flying or the exact size, but i can say that the majority of other air traffic was either taking off or coming in for landing were approximately at same height.  i was able to keep my eye on the object until i got close to the east river road split, where it banked off to my left and i lost it behind the skyline. the traffic behind me was probably not happy with me; but there was no place for me to stop - and i didn't want to cause an accident. the shape of the object was triangular, it wasn't so much the shape that caught my eye but the fact that if it was a jet  or plane or helicopter, it's lights would have been flashing; also there were no red or green lights on this object that i could see from underneath.  each corner of the triangle had a harsh, bright white light, and the center of the object seemed to have a muted light of white and blue. i could easily see the silhouette of the triangular shape against the twilight of the sky. there was no reflection. no exhaust. i've seen other reports where they would say that the triangular craft is monstrous - this was nothing on a grand scale. i talked to my friend first, as i didn't want to report it as i thought it was some type of military craft. then my thought was, why wouldn't they hide in plain sight - all this air traffic - they would just blend in.
i wasn't scared, i wasn't excited, i just wanted to keep my eye on it and try and figure out what "it" was.
content.summary: Driving home from work at dusk and noticed an odd craft that didn't look like any of the myriad of jets that are in the heavy fly zone over the twin cities. tried to keep eye contact as long as possible during traffic heading home.

content.detailedDescription: This is a object on the ground in daylight hours.It was on a fenceline i did not see it but it was told to us by a neighbor.He was working a feild when he seen the balloon type object near our and his fenceline. he told us that he thaught some kids wear playing nearby so he drove  up closer.As he got out to look at the balloon it increased in size to about the size of a car. the hair on his arms raised up. the object shot up trailinga rainbow hard to explain you would have to talk to him he is in his 80s. he said he toched the area were it was and his hand is to this day still numb.He is scared he wasnt at first but i think he wants to talk to someone.
content.summary: A object the size of a childs balloon  increased in size many times.It then shot up in the air with a rainbow trail.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed near 50 of the fireball types floating in the sky, disappeared quickly after hovering for about 5 minutes, directly there after, multiple "flashing" types spotted zipping and floating across same span of sky, blinking red, blue, orange and white. move in erratic patterns and either converge or distance themselves from each other. have seen the same phenomena several occasions in past. was even posted in the beaver county times, local newspaper. the triangle lights seen in the summer of this year. have seen the fireball type on several occasions as well. on july fourth. and a while before that. this got my attention, however, because of the sheer number of fireballs i spotted. as i said, between 50 and 60.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two types, flashing, and fireball type

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car at a highway rest stop. it was very warm and crystal clear that night.Ihad my head out the car window chcking out the stars and looking for sattelites,sometimes you can see them moving across the sky.I saw a very bright light that appeared to be a sattelite, it was way up there,but it suddenly came down to an alttitude where commercial airliners fly.But it didn't make any noise at all.It was moving from west to east.Then all of the sudden it stopped cold in mid-air,made a perfect square i would guess to be about 300 to 400 yards square and then proceeded on it's original course.It stayed like this for quite a while and then made a series of zig-zag movements and then it was gone,faster than anything i ever seen flying before.
content.summary: A single very bright white light.

content.detailedDescription:
After some more processing for more detail of the mother ship, i am submitting to you the original video footage of the 23x sport scope near infrared observation of a mother ship several miles up in the air.  this is rather raw footage, so don't get ill from the telescope bouncing around...

i am also attaching a bitmap picture (processed for detail).  i believe this will be one of the most highest quality pictures of a mother ship that mufon has ever received.  it is 89 megabytes in size.   it should be competitive in resolution to a military spy satellite photograph, and invaluable for research purposes.

in addition, i am attaching a jpg picture separately of this mother ship observed on november 3, in case people cannot open the uncompressed bitmap picture contained in the zip file due to memory of computer restrictions.

respectfully,

jcc
content.summary: Mother ship addendum

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving home from work yesterday 11/3/08. it was 6:12 pm when i sighted "object".

to the south i saw the moon and whatever planet or star that is currently very close to it.

i turned north (away from the moon) onto hwy 37. there was nothing visible in the sky to the north because of total cloud coverage. 

after about 2 minutes of driving, i saw a starlike object suddenly appear below the cloud line. it descended almost straight down, very rapidly and vanished. (it may have been already descending from above the cloudline, invisible to me)

it was a round, bright whitish blue light (looking very much like a star except slightly brighter). it appeared about a mile to the north of my vehicle, slightly to the west of hwy 37 approx 6 overall miles north of bloomington, in.

the object descended very rapidly almost straight down. its trajectory leaned to the west slightly, by only 5 degrees.  

the object held its round shape perfectly.  there was no streaking or trail behind it. the light remained very consistent and no flashing.

after 2-3 seconds it vanished. it was probably a few hundred feet above the tree lines when it just disappeared. it just disappeared, no noise and no flash.

i noticed the object because the sky was darkening and the clouds were low with a dark blue back drop. i was driving looking ahead at the road and the light caught my eye. i thought at first it was a star.

as i kept driving i wondered how a star could basically just drop straight down out of the sky, below the clouds and hold its shape perfectly and quietly disappear above the trees.
content.summary: Saw starlike object appear below cloudline and descend rapidly and vanish

content.summary: Saw starlike object appear below cloudline and descend rapidly and vanish

content.detailedDescription: I worked as a night watchman for a private contractor (rail services) at the now defunct ford motor assembly plant in edison, nj, from 1991 to 1995. i was responsible for night-time security of an outdoor staging lot filled with new vehicles waiting to be loaded onto specialized railroad cars each morning. part of my job was to walk through the lot and place inspection slips on the dashboard of each vehicle. one night while i was carrying out this procedure, my attention was suddenly drawn to a brightly illuminated section of cloud cover overhead. my first thought was that it was just a spotlight being tested for a store opening or some other such event. i panned the horizon, looking for a beam of light eminating from the ground, but no such beam was visible. as i continued to observe the lighted area of clouds, i felt strongly that the light source was shining through the cloud cover from above. here's where the story gets really interesting. while looking directly at the illuminated section of clouds, the color of the light changed instantly from white to red. it remained red for approximately 10 seconds, then instantly changed back to a white color. after approximately 10 more seconds, the light went out as if someone threw a swith to turn it off. the area of lighted clouds was stationary throughout the duration of the event - no movement whatsoever. i am still convinced that the light source was eminating from above the cloud cover and shining through the clouds form above, not reflecting off the underside like a spot light. i am a graphic designer and i have an advanced knowledge of lighting effects - reflection, refraction, ambience, etc... no light beams were visible. there was no noise at all  - just dead silence. i worked as a night watchman at various locations for almost 15 years and i have witnessed meteors, lunar eclipses, planes, helicopters... you name it. this was something different that i cannot explain.
content.summary: Strange multi-colored illumination of a section of clouds

content.detailedDescription: Itwas bigger than the c4 transport planes frequent to this area. at first it appeared as a bright whit boomerang shape coming from the north. it then grew in size to the shape of a chev, the font center of it grew brighter approaching slowly due south. it emmited a low hum.                                                                         answer to #1 it was about 10 oclock at night, i was with a friend on a dock on lake powel florida fin#2nishing up a day of fishing.                       #2 at first i thought it was a flock of white birds in a v shaped formation but as it got closer it started to change. it got bigger as it grew closer, and took on the shape of a chevron. as it passed over the lake it was a v type triangle shape,bright white at its tip ,fading down the sides. when it passed over us it appeared to be a arrowhead shaped object that was translucent, evan transparent in the center. it distorted the starfield that was above it.It slowly moved off to the south eimitting a low humming sound and disappeared from sight after several minutes. i turned to my friend and asked "did you just see that?" my friend aswered "did you just see that too?" we had been speechless for over 5 minutes durring the sighting. we don't know what we saw, but we both aggreed that it was visible approaching, then was semi transparent as it passed over{in a triangle, arrowhead shape} and faded in light as it flew south and dissapeared.
content.summary: It approched from the north, boomerang shaped bright white light, it grw in size

content.detailedDescription: Barbara, a wheel chair bound retiree from uniontown called and described the following. she and her husband were at century 3 mall.  her husband was setting on a bendh in the mall.  barbara went to the mens dept.  in jc penny.  while there she saw a creature that looked like an et.  there was another women present with her young children.  she says they were rushing out of the area.  her son said" i want to see", and the mother replied "no, you can't, lets go now!"  barbara in her wheelchair, saw a grey man approximately 41/2 inches tall, wearing a red/black plaid shirt and blue pants.  he was standing by a clothes rack.  she saw his profile and then looked away.  when she looked back he was now facing her.  she described him as being male, no hair, grey skin, almond black eyes with a lumpy heavily wrinkled face.  she said the face was not human, it looked like an animal.  she again looked away because its not polite to stare, and when she looked  back.. he is gone.  she went to the register to ask for security but no body was around.  she wasn't afraid and said that he had a pleasant smile on his face.  she decided to leave the store because she and her husband were planning to attend a movie.  barbara tried to tell her husband but he told her to tell him after the movie.  barbara recalled sitting in the dark theater in the rear by the exit door.  every time the door opened, she looked to see if the creature was there.  she started to get frightened. barbara said that she completely forgot about the encounter and never told her husband until 2 months later when she saw a ufo article by john ventre in the tribune review.  it seemed to jar her memory.  she said she has a tremendous memory and can tell details from years ago, but is surprised she repressed this memory.  she believes that when the creature was staring at her, that it made the memory fade away.  barbara said that the newspaper article mentioned a ufo sighting in jefferson hills right near the mall at the same time she had her experience.
content.summary: Saw an entity

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1996,we took our anual trip to mexico to ride motor cycles.After a long day of riding me and my brother inlaw had dinner in the back yard of his mothers house.This sits about two streets from the beach.It was july,about a week after the forth of july.So we finished up dinner and started to clean up our bikes.Although its a week after the fourth of july,children are still lighting off fire works.So we can hear the popping.Sometimes we could see the sparks.So as we contnued to clean the bikes, i was neeling down when i noticed a bright light rising over the fence,bright yellow lights.I drew my brothers attention to the object.As we watched the obect in was spinning counter clock wise very fast when i first saw it i thought it was a fire work,something that some one had thrown over the fence.I noticed that it wasnt falling but it kept rising.This object looked like a circle or disc shaped but the shape was black ecept for the lights.The lights shone like solid yellow beems commig from what looked like windows,all lined up along the side.The object kept spinning and rising at a high rate of speed until we couldnt see it any longer diappearing over the trees.We did not chase it or go looking for it.We just stood there looking at each other in dis belief.This happened 12 years ago,but in my mind it like it happened yestrday.
content.summary: The object  rose above the beach spinning and shinning with bright yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription: We took a picture of a plane that looked like a missile and a few days later loaded it on the computer.We were amazed to see what looked like a bunch of smaller type objects going in the opposite direction of the plane missile.We have the photo and it should be looked at because it is very strange and we are not sure what it is. note at another date around late summer we heard a small plane revving up his motor and my wife saw what we belive was a thing called a rod but it was very big from her description, i also heard the plane that seemed to be in distress... motor revivng.. my wife said she thought they were going to collide.We would like somebady to see this photo to see if its anything that should be investigated.Please let us know what you think .We are responsible people in our early 60s and have seen plenty of unusual things this is the first time we have said  anything because people think your crazy.Best regards r.J. romano
content.summary: Have photo looks like missile with pastel color objects around it many of them

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving on i-64 west near belleville il last
night around 8 or 830pm and saw a very large triangular object with very
bright lights around it in a field to the right of the interstate.  the
object seemed as thought it was suspended in midair and it was about
treetop level. it did not appear to be a helicopter at all because it
was shaped like a triangle and was way too large. we were driving around
70mph and so this all happened very quickly but we thought maybe it was
a brightly lit tower in the field but then it started moving across the
interstate in a southward direction very slowly around 10 or 15 mph and
disappeared over the trees on the south side of i64. we were very
disturbed by what we saw, and unfortunately did not have time to take a picture.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with bright lights on all corners plus smaller lights around the sides in belleville, il

content.detailedDescription: The time indicated above is approximate. i collected my sister pamela and some of the kids we played with from the family across the street larry, dennis and one of the girls either evelyn or joyce heifner and i took them to the grey base just over the hill from where i lived at 615 plum st novato calif. to see the base that was there.  at the time i was greatly impressed by the base and was strongly attracted to it.  we went to the ratty old grey house that served as one of the entrances to the base and we saw the following sight.  a landed smaller ufo was sitting on the ground behind the old house.  it was the same type that i and larry, dennis heifner and steven laycock explored when we found it empty on the same hill side in another event.  at the foot of the ladder of the ufo that was behind the old house were three young human women in bubble hair dos that were kind of huddled together and acting subdued.  one of the twin young men that i have mentioned in other postings at the mufon site was talking to  a grey a little ways away from the women.  the young man was about 20 years old white dark hair and had an over all italian look to him and was dressed in dark clothes.  the grey was a classic grey.  as we watched things from the edge of the surrounding brush in the back of the house i became very concerned for the safety of the women that the young man was selling them in effect to the grey.  the man had a big smug grin on his face and was a vicious predator in appearance.  very dangerous.  the grey saw us and paniced and said "look down"  so i looked down at the ground.  the grey was furious that we were there seeing what was going on.  my sister who was younger said "dont you hurt my brother"  she was young but she would have fought for me.  the grey said "go away and stop bothering us" and that is about where my current memory of the event stops.  i have selected this event out of many because of the multiple witnesses and the presence of a landed ufo, other adult abductees, the human like man working with the greys and the presence of the grey.  the ufo is as i have described in postings at mufon.  round with a dome in the center. tripod landing gear hinged at the edge of the thing, stairs coming down from the center a ring of vents on the out side edge. tail on the top part.It was the color of the dry grass on the hill at the time.  the event establishes the presense of greys and ufos at the house and the fact that human like beings were working with the greys probably as agents in our society at that early date.  it also establishes that abduction were being carried out by the human like beings.  at the time i was very concerned for the lives of the young women above.  it was the feeling i got at the time that they. were really in danger.  i had no doubt in my mind at the time that i was looking at a landed ufo, a space alien (grey) and a human that was an agent for the greys who was very dangerous.
content.summary: I and four friends encountered a landed ufo at the base with a human selling(?) four young women to a grey

content.detailedDescription: While standing in my front yard at 10:00 p.M. on monday, 11/3/08, i witnessed a very large (about 300 ft) object crossing from west to east. it was boomerang shaped, with 6 very intense blue-green lights on the leading edge. it was travelling at a very low altitude, about 500 feet above the ground, at approximately 30mph. it was completely silent, and blotted out the stars as it passed over and out of my line of sight behind the neighbors homes and trees. i was so excited when i realized i must have seen a ufo, i ran inside and woke my wife, who asked if i had the telescope handy. i am an astronomy buff, and had considered bringing out the telescope, as the sky was very clear. too bad i didn't, as i would have gotten a good close-up look! this morning i called the boca chica naval air station, which is quite close to me, just across the highway (busy us1) and a few miles east. they had no knowledge of any object, but did tell me two helicopters were in the vicinity around that time. in the past they've had surveillance blimps at the base, so initially that's what i thought it was, until it moved closer. i live in a suburb just north of key west called key haven, where there are few street lights and little other light interference. there is no place at the air station for something this large to land, so i doubt it originated there. i find it difficult to believe no one else has reported this (so far), and i even called the local newspaper, "the key west citizen", to ask if anyone had called them about it. i have a background in surveying, so i'm able to fairly accurately judge distance, angle, and size - this thing was huge, and passed almost directly overhead. i don't drink or do drugs, i have a degree in biology, and i work as a construction estimator and occasionally do autocad drafting.  i'm a "show me" kinda guy - n0-nonsense, logical, and pretty straight-forward. this is definitely a first for me; i've always tried to keep an open mind, never saying never, but i will never forget this experience. with or without my telescope, i will always be looking for a repeat performance. one of the guys i spoke with at the base said he'd check the radar data and call me back, but i doubt he will.
content.summary: 300ft width, silent w. intense blue-green lights, low altitude

content.detailedDescription: All of the sightings occurred at my house in surprise az looking ssw. i noticed them because i always look up to see what if anything is visible. i have witnessed orange spheres on various occasions in various formations. they appear as if a light switch is turned on and disappear as if the switch is turned off. sometimes they come on all at once and sometimes one at a time. as you can see from the photo they are quite bright. the ufos seem to flicker which may be the effects of the atmosphere. the only time i see them move is when they reappear in a different position. i have no clue how high they are. one of the first sightings was in the early spring of 2006 at approximately nine pm wherein i saw three spaced similar to the two in the photo. when i shined a green laser at them they disappeared and instantly reappeared with five and formed into a huge "w" in the same area of the sky. the fact that they disappeared and reappeared may be coincidence, if they are located approximately one-hundred miles from my location. if they are that far away they would have to be huge. on another occasion i saw six in a very odd lopsided rectangle. i was unable to get photos of that event. every sighting occurred at approximately ten pm on tuesday. i never heard any sound. on a number of occasions i have seen and heard six to twelve f-16's from luke air force base heading in the direction of the lights. i never felt threatened or danger. just a strong curiousity of where and what they are. the photo was taken using a canon rebel 35mm using a 75mm to 300mm lens, on a tripod, time exposure of 4 seconds.The photo is not changed in any way and yes i do have the negatives.
content.summary: Have seen orange spheres on numerous occasions.

content.detailedDescription:
Update to freestone county sighting on tues. oct, 21st. three long cylinder objects above horizon due west of fairfield at dusk tx, us   
2008-11-03 2008-08-15 bright white longer than a blimp low slow than just gone really big! 


basicly the exact same thing i seen befor heading the same direction same everything and aproximetly the same locatoion and time...We are only 2 or 3 county away from freestone county maby about 60 miles away everything the same...The other report is the same...
please whoever reported the freestone county sighting email me asap...I want to know it this is the same thing...Who eles has reported this? any explinations? when was the first sighting? mine was on aug 15 2008....Need so bad to know what it is
jenn.Peden@yahoo.Com
content.summary: just seen the report from freestone county sightin. has to be the same thing!

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking my dog when my friend pointed out some weird lights in the sky.  there were two sets of lights in a boomerang shape.  the were very high in the sky and flying in circles around each other.  they would fade in and out like the lights were only on one side of the crafts.

we ran inside and when we came out it looked like 3 planes were flying around the area where we had seen the lights.
content.summary: Lights flying over boulder
